article.title: U.S. Army Orders Helmet Sensors
article.author: George I. Seffers

tags.tag: Charles F. Day and Associates LLC

article.text: Charles F. Day and Associates LLC, Stafford, Va., was awarded a cost-plus-fixed-fee contract with a maximum value of $8,023,728 for the field technician services in support of the Generation II Helmet Sensors. The Army Contracting Command, Aberdeen Proving Ground, Md., is the contracting activity.
